cgcloud__Product_Hierarchy__c.name: cgcloud__Product_Hierarchy__c
cgcloud__Product_Hierarchy__c.description: Relation from a product (Child_Product) to its parent. This relation is time-framed.

cgcloud__Parent_Product_Code__c.description: Unique identifier of the parent product.

cgcloud__Parent_Product_Description__c.description: Short description of the parent product.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the product (Child_Product) record.

cgcloud__Structure_Type__c.description: Specifies the structure type of the hierarchy.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: The entry is valid from this date onwards.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: The entry is valid until this date.
